Serialized Form

  • Package <Unnamed>

    • Class Client extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • clientID

          java.lang.String clientID
          The String name of a client.

        • enter

          int enter
          Field to simplify denoting an enter key event

        • enterPressed

          boolean enterPressed
          Field to indicate that enter was pressed

        • jcUserList

          javax.swing.JComboBox<java.lang.String> jcUserList
          Combo box populated with active users to allow the user to select the recipient to send a message to.

          Will be removed when a proper Buddy List has been implemented

        • msgText

          javax.swing.JTextArea msgText
          Text box to enter text to be sent to another client via the Server.

        • objectInputStream

          java.io.ObjectInputStream objectInputStream
          Used to receive Communication objects from the Server

        • objectOutputStream

          java.io.ObjectOutputStream objectOutputStream
          Used to send Communication objects to the Server to be processed and routed to the recipient

        • sendBtn

          javax.swing.JButton sendBtn
          Button to initiate the process of sending the text in msgText to the intended recipient and display it in the srText box

        • serverIP

          java.lang.String serverIP
          Stores the IP address of the Server

        • shift

          int shift
          Field to simplify denoting a shift key event

        • shiftPressed

          boolean shiftPressed
          Field to indicate that shift was pressed

        • socket

          java.net.Socket socket
          Provides the connection to the Server

        • srText

          javax.swing.JTextArea srText
          Text box to display sent and received messages.

        • userListLabel

          javax.swing.JLabel userListLabel
          Label for the jcUserList combo box.

          Will be removed when a proper Buddy List has been implemented

    • Class Message extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • COMMTYPE

          int COMMTYPE
          Constant identifier for Communication subclass Message.

        • date

          java.util.Date date
          The Date object used to allow timestamps for sent/received messages.

        • message

          java.lang.String message
          The text-based message to be sent--the main piece of the Message object

        • recipient

          java.lang.String recipient
          The name of the recipient of the Message object.

        • sender

          java.lang.String sender
          The name of the sender of the Message object.

    • Class OnlineStatus extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • clientID

          java.lang.String clientID
          The String identifier for the originating client

        • online

          boolean online
          The boolean value that denotes whether the originating Client is online

    • Class Server extends javax.swing.JFrame implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • activeClientList

          java.util.List<Server.ServeAClient> activeClientList
          A list of ServeAClient objects to allow the server to reference the correct client when receiving or transmitting a Communication object.

        • activeUsers

          java.util.List<java.lang.String> activeUsers
          A list of String names for each user who is currently connected to the server. Used to easily transmit updates of new connected users to each connected client.

        • serverLogs

          javax.swing.JTextArea serverLogs
          The main text box, used to display log information for the server, such as client connect events, updates to clients' user lists, etc.

    • Class UserList extends java.lang.Object implements Serializable

      • Serialized Fields

        • clientID

          java.lang.String clientID

        • COMMTYPE

          int COMMTYPE
          Constant identifier for Communication subclass UserList

        • userList

          java.util.List<java.lang.String> userList
          The textual list of users to be encapsulated.
